titles.title: Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah, the Lord reigns,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah, the Lord reigns,
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah,
The Lord Almighty reigns.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He has showed His awesome power,
He has triumphed mightily,
He has triumphed over darkness and the grave.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He has broken chains that bound us,
He has set the prisoner free,
By His own great mercy we are saved.
